title: Training Program for Developing Mobile Applications to Prevent Pressure Injuries for Elderly Care Providers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing or elderly care-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Pre-service/In-service Teachers, Domain Expertise: Intermediate, Subject/Job Field: Application of Mathematics-Based Data Analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the causes and stage-specific characteristics of pressure injuries.
Learners can develop pressure injury prevention management plans using mobile application interfaces.
Learners can analyze the suitability of application content by applying the SAM evaluation tool.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
